locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This pilot fills up fast. Prime parking is enforced. A lot of parking on a shoulder on the sb ramp. Shower is good. No beer. But you can get some from ta.

If you are traveling the bathrooms are spacious and they even have individual shower stalls to rent. Took a peek.... very clean! Also got (2) Slices of Pizza with a 20oz Coca-Cola product for $8. They weren't NY or Chicago quality but not ‚Ä¶

Was in the area to drop trailer and take a quick shower, we are  a family of 3, very small bathroom unit.  No room to do anything.  This location definitely needs some remodeling...it does have a truckers lounge and steak n shake restaurant ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . An awesome clerk named Lisa went above and beyond to help us, turned our entire evening around. To the young man back in the shower area, top notch job. When it's promotion/pay raise time be sure not to look these two people over. Thanks ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ work on the phone when I go to use it. This caused me to miss a notification that a shower was supposedly ready for me to use, and I wound up losing a shower credit because of this. Oh, and get this: there were showers that were waiting ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in a good spot if you want to stretch your legs for a little walk. Been a while since Ive seen a good pilot. Only complaint here is they could stand to raise the water heater temp. I want 2nd degree burns if Im paying money for a shower.
Drivers make you have a rubber slippers to take your shower in or go to another truck stop. For a pilot travel center that is known for clean showers this one was deplorable!!
Shower #4. Dirty, moldy, dusty, filthy, and shameful. üò™ ‚Ä¶

While I had to wait for a shower, I must say that it was clean and roomy.  Steak and shake had excellent food, though I usually walk to the Zaxbys next door.  I've never had to wait for fuel and there always seems to be a new squeegee to ‚Ä¶

Real friendly people working here. No automated shower system yet but you can go in & purchase one or of you have any free showers it will be deducted from your account. The showers are a bit small but they are clean.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Showers were so bad I refused to shower in them! ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ On the bright side, I am liking the new showers, didn't use them before but they are spacious, and I like the shower knob not being under the shower head, but right next to where you walk in. So you don't get splashed with cold water. Not ‚Ä¶

2-23-25 Ok. I get it. You want to complain about drivers not getting showers and then supply us with showers that aren‚Äôt suitable for a homeless person. Got it. This is pathetic! Either supply hair dryers or don‚Äôt. Please take them all out ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ construction - no indoor restrooms- only portable toilets outdoors in the 105 degree heat! No shower porter so no showers were available. They should put something on google or somewhere letting you know they have only limited facilities ‚Ä¶

Friendly staff, subway was gd, showers had hot water, decent pressure, now the down side, the parking lot has some  huge craters, watch out, they will swallow u up, parking lot is so dark, 1 giant spotlight isn't enough. It may appear ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ tell you this place is a dump. The showers are down, they've been down for who knows how long, the employees won't tell you and they can't even tell you when they're going to be back up. They're great suggestion is to go across the ‚Ä¶

It's one of the worst TA's. Always long waiting time for the shower. There's one person who cleans the showers, and he takes long breaks. Others just chitchatting behind the counter. Drivers, if you can avoid this place .
Showers are not good. Not very clean. Sink and shower drain is stopped up. Would not recommend. Need maintenance done and good cleaning on driver showers.

‚Ä¶ rather than waiting on customers. Last, buying fuel here is a joke. After 2 tanks of fuel I still don't qualify for a shower! My wife and I walked across the street to get a shower because I have 20 there! I continue trying to do business ‚Ä¶

Rude employees, it smelt really musty in the shower and I looked closer and seen mold in the corners of the shower.... Then I got some Popeyes and it tasted 3 days old. They don't have many options for food and the showers/restrooms are ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ the food  is good waitresses are awesome. Bathrooms are not clean, no hot water in the shower and during the day the people at the counter are ALWAYS on their phones, what they are saying I have no idea. So if you‚Äôre looking for a place to ‚Ä¶

The remodel they did is nice. But the people who wait on you very rude. Charge $8 for shower ok no wash cloth cold shower and the room to shower and shower stall very very nasty . Tried to get my money back nope . ‚Ä¶
Only allow truckers to shower anyone traveling should be able to shower

locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower's are clean with lots of hot water and good water pressure. ‚Ä¶
If you shutdown the mens restroom to clean,open a shower room so we can use the restroom. We can't be running around town trying to use the bathroom.Pilot does it. Be better.
Nice and clean truck stop. Shower pressure is great.

Very clean showers the girl that cleans them did an amazing job üòä she‚Äôs very nice to as I thanked her for such a clean shower (her job is so under appreciated) bathrooms were clean store itself was employees were friendly will definitely be ‚Ä¶

As a brand of truck stop I like loves and this one's about average. Shower area looks clean. There were lines at both counters (the truckers and the car) and It didn't look like it was going to let up at the restaurant, so we did Drive ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ the shower 5 open shower rooms but there in Nobody to clean it and 5ppl still waiting almost an hour i wait in line. what a ridiculous Management! ‚Ä¶

Clean shower. Stayed hot all the way through. Good food choices within walking distance if you dont want Arby's. Easy and unique parking layout around the pond with a good number of spaces for Florida (never big enough in Florida). Friendly ‚Ä¶

Was told since the overnight team member didnt come in I only had 20 minutes to complete my shower. Not acceptable. To compensate me for my troubles I was given the shower for free. I guess that's better than going dirty.
Friendly staff. Extremely clean shower. Easy off easy on access. So much better than a Pilot.

Shower towels are old and stinky,
better bring yours.

One more and TA/PETRO will earn my business.
